title: I Think Kled Needs More Lore
body: He's a guy who rides an immortal Draklops and sometimes kicks ass and takes what land he wants, also has EVERY MILITARY TITAL! He needs a new animatic where he's kicking a horde of vikings or another champion relation or like literally anything. - {{champion:240}}  main

there always has to be a character that just is like that, no laws of physics, time or anything.
they are just.... omnipresent.

but kled is just so....
strange.
a noxian yordle, yordles aren't seen in public due to racism, and no normal yordle would join noxus willingly.
second of all, noxus allowed him to be in the army, and be commanders of multiple divisions.
and none of his soldiers give a shit that their command is a yordle.
He is also one his kind to have REAL LIVE VIOLENT ANGER and even at seemingly harmless things.

bard has a base story that he travels dimensions protecting people and worlds, we don't fully understand him so we can't judge him.

Noxus isn't a "racist" state. Sure they're cruel, but they're incredibly even handed. They can basically be summed out like this: It doesn't matter who you are, if you have the strength to survive, you can thrive in Noxus.
